mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO user_tb (nice_name,name,password, reg_time, last_login_time, openid ) VALUES (#{niceName},#{name},#{password}, #{regTime}, #{lastLoginTime}, #{openid} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user_tb SET nice_name=#{niceName}, name=#{name}, openid=#{openid}, password=#{password}, reg_time=#{regTime}, last_login_time=#{lastLoginTime} WHERE user_id=#{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, nice_name, name, password, openid, reg_time, last_login_time FROM user_tb WHERE user_id=#{userId}
SELECT user_id, nice_name, name, password, openid, reg_time, last_login_time FROM user_tb ORDER BY reg_time DESC LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize}
SELECT user_id, nice_name, name, password, openid, reg_time, last_login_time FROM user_tb ORDER BY reg_time DESC
SELECT count(user_id) FROM user_tb WHERE name=#{name}
SELECT user_id, nice_name, name, password, openid, reg_time, last_login_time FROM user_tb WHERE name=#{name}
SELECT user_id, nice_name, name, password, openid, reg_time, last_login_time FROM user_tb WHERE name=#{name} and password=#{password}
SELECT user_id, nice_name, name, password, openid, reg_time, last_login_time FROM user_tb WHERE openid=#{openid}
